feed.title: Aid's Little Site Updates
feed.subtitle: A simple feed mostly centric around site updates with new content or fixes

entry.title: Polls now work!
entry.content: Added polls to the index page, even though it's fucking ass to set up; thanks to starry-knight for figuring out how to do it (aka github page you embed)

entry.title: New OC page!
entry.content: Made another OC page!! Although it's not as fleshed out, he's Hideki's hubby and still means a lot to me even if retired

entry.title: Updated now page
entry.content: Updated now page again! ... I didn't realize it's been a bit over two weeks since my last update; I wanna try to keep them to a bi-weekly basis for my own tracking as well to look back on for funsies

entry.title: Made a toybox page!
entry.content: Added a toybox page to store cute pixels, inspired off other toyboxes!! I ... do need to make a nicer pixel shelf though ...

entry.title: Updated now page
entry.content: New /now entry to catch everything up to the present

entry.title: Added cool video section to front page
entry.content: Added a YouTube video to the front page! :P I'll just be using it to drop cool videos I enjoyed on a [unknown] time basis

entry.title: New Blog Entry: Journaling
entry.content: New blog entry mostly around journaling for me

entry.title: Nostalgia games added to media log
entry.content:
RSS feed is special and gets a little update I'm not placing on my front page ... but it's just me giving a heads up that I added a bunch more games to my media log, mostly centric around my nostalgia list off backloggd; not all of them have a review yet (since my brain would burn out writing that many) but I got them included for when I'm ready to write

Sorry for the massive rant under Elsword (I'm not)

entry.title: Created a faux listography page
entry.content:
I found Kalechip's cool fake listography page template and I wanted to make a little page for just thought dumps + random links I feel won't fit into my bookmarks page ... I probably won't make any update posts when I add stuff to it, since that's literally just a brain dump zone, but it's a nice little slice of life area where everything is gathered more nicely.

I am terrible at knowing what to make lists of though, even though I love the concept a lot :P

entry.title: New Blog Entry!
entry.content:
New blog entry yapping mostly about recognizing traits of myself (some of which I didn't know) in my own OCs.

(I also expanded more on my media log, but that's minor compared to this 😉)

entry.title: New Media Logging Page
entry.content: I caved and made a media log to document some of my tracked media in a single place; although it won't be everything I list in my tracking specific sites, I'd like to show off the stuff I've consumed and my thoughts on them!

entry.title: Now Page Update!
entry.content: New /now entry! Just new life updates + what's been going on

entry.title: New Blog ... Diary-esque Post
entry.content: New blog post, though I'd call it more of an unorganized thought dump. Mostly surrounding me talking about how I view my own identity, and more as something to empty my brain out of my thoughts! It's definitely a more personal blab.

entry.title: New OC Page Added!
entry.content: Brought in one of my oldest OCs which is my Bleach OC! Her profile is rough cause god knows it was written well over ten years ago, but she's one of my more developed OCs I had immensely active for 3–4 years before she was retired. Had it not been for her, I'd have never met such wonderful people in the OC/Canon community back then.

entry.title: On Being a Non-Sharing Yume
entry.content: Mostly a thought dump blog about how some people feel hostile towards non-sharing yumes

entry.title: Program/Tools Bookmarks
entry.content: Began work on the program list on my bookmarks, though I know I'm still missing quite a few

entry.title: RSS Feed Now Exists!
entry.content: New RSS feed has been made, and has been added to the site!! It'll mostly house my site updates and new page infos
